original_text: I will help those who feel tired. I will make those who feel weak strong again. I will help those who feel tired. I will make those who feel weak strong again. I will help those who feel tired. I will make those who feel weak strong again. I will help those who feel tired. I will make those who feel weak strong again. I will help those who feel tired. I will make those who feel weak strong again.
korean_text: 이는 내가 그 피곤한 심령을 상쾌하게 하며 모든 연약한 심령을 만족하게 하였음이라 하시기로

sentences.original_text: I will help those who feel tired.
I will make those who feel weak strong again.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 약한 자들을 다시 강하게 만들 것이다.
